name: National Educational Development Centre
briefDescription: National Education Development Center popularly known as NEDC is a professionally committed NGO active in skill development and issue based action program. The primary focus of the organization is on the problems faced by the women and destitute and in their struggle for empowerment. NEDC is a non -governmental organization founded and incorporated on the 1st October 1991 with registration number 432/1991. The organization has its presence in Uttarkhand and Uttar Pradesh. We cover most of the hilly and the non accessible interior areas in the state.OUR MISSIONTo empower the women through education, self-help, cooperative, network and to access rights.To promote education, awareness, skills and IT through establish the educational institu
